name: TIME (edge) LORD
description:
"Live life on the edge of time and don't let them reach your edge"

A tower defense game with adaptive music! Those damned primitives are coming to get you, defend your hill by placing turrets. Find out where an enemy is coming from and what type they are by listening to the music. Watch the timer! Every turret you build costs time (you're a time lord, I think?). If the enemies get to the {edge} you lose.

Full of bugs, we're so aware.

Instructions: 

* You start with 60 time resources
* Placing turrets spends time
* Defeating enemies and surviving a wave gives you time
* Win by surviving 20 waves!

Good Luck!

Credits:
